tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Zirconia Crowns,Dental Implant Fixing,Root Canal Treatment (RCT),
review: My recent experience with emergency dental treatment exceeded expectations. The dental team, led by Dr. Gupta, demonstrated remarkable professionalism by promptly addressing my urgent needs. Dr. Gupta not only alleviated my anxiety but also provided a detailed and well-informed treatment plan. Dr. Vani played a crucial role in implementing the plan, supporting my recovery with optimal options. The care was thorough, showcasing the dentist's expertise through precise and efficient treatment. The office staff, with their compassion and accommodation, fostered a reassuring environment during a stressful situation. In summary, the outstanding service received during this emergency dental visit left me profoundly impressed and grateful for their unwavering commitment to patient care.

My wife Usha had bad teeth for a long time. She had to go for removal of many teeth and was managing with partial dentures. It was not only inconvenient but not very hygienic also. Then she had few more teeth to be taken out. Then we met Dr. Saurabh Gupta. He suggested permanent solution with implant. The way he explained how it works and all the options with their merits and de-merits it was just amazing and showed his expertise in the field. We went for ten implants and complete permanent teeth. All through the process Dr. Saurabh Gupta was so helpful and did everything with great skill. It has been more than five years and she had absolutely no trouble at all. He did it so well that most of the time she forgets that she has artificial teeth. I would recommend Dr. Saurabh Gupta for anything you want for dentistry. His skill is unmatched.

*** ****** ** *** **** ******* * **** **** **** **** He has the best infrastructure and he takes time to explain everything... I am totally satisfied with his work... Friendly nature of doctor and staff made me feel like family.... Would highly recommend to anyone.... üëçüèªüëçüèªüëçüèªüëçüèª

Dr Saurabh was very helpful and he explained the entire process by sharing full details. Also would like to mention about Dr Rutuja as she was the one who did fillings and scaling for me. She was very cooperative and did the entire process with lot of patience. Would definitely recommend the clinic based on the experience I had. Also looking forward for my next appointment with Dr Rutuja and Dr Saurabh.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Had a very good experience in his clinic, I was explained about the condition and what actions would be required, post which lady doctor helped to carryout procedure without any pain, she was very professional and dealt each step in an orderly manner and very gentle in her actions to make it a pain free experience for me

Dr. Saurabh Gupta is very friendly with his patients and makes them feel very comfortable whole listening to their problems and while treating them as well. The whole process was so easy and am completely satisfied with the treatment i got here. Big thumbs up to him and his whole team.

I strongly recommend doctor Saurabh for any dental problems; really appreciate the way he tries to understand and treat the problem with great determination and commitment. 
I had a great experience. Thank you, Doctor for the Implant and RCT the treatment ****** ****** **** *** ***

Dr.Gupta is very ************** friendly and skilled

Very satisfied with the services provided. the followup by the staff shows they care about the patient health. 

Recommend this clinic on Kananapura Road
It was first visit and it was a good experience. Did not have to wait long for this as well. Gooooood
